pullrequest.title: Suppport for the Polaris XP900 vehicle

content.raw:
We are not including by default in our launch files the spawn of the Polaris, right? It does not appear automatically after launching drc_practice_task_1 for example.

I can insert the model manually, get a [visual warning](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo_models/pull-request/61/added-polaris-ranger-xp900/diff#comment-862320), but I'm unable to see any rostopic related to the vehicle. I'm probably missing something.
content.html:
We are not including by default in our launch files the spawn of the Polaris, right? It does not appear automatically after launching drc_practice_task_1 for example.

I can insert the model manually, get a visual warning, but I'm unable to see any rostopic related to the vehicle. I'm probably missing something.
